== Aprofplot == 

Aprofplot is a java visualization tool for the profiling data generated by aprof.

=== Download ===
{{{
svn checkout http://aprof.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/aprofplot aprofplot
}}}
Jcommon and Jfreechart are dependencies of aprofplot, they are included with aproplot source code (under `aprofplot/lib`).
=== Compile ===
{{{
cd aprofplot
ant
}}}
This should built a jar file.
=== Run ===
You can run the builded jar in this way:
{{{
cd aprofplot
ant run
}}}
